title: Planned Maintenance - Valve Maintenance
description: Planned maintenance on Pressure Reducing Valves (PRVs) to ensure network operating effectively. Due to complexity of work, it may take longer than expected.
location:
Durbanville and surrounding areas 
City teams would like to complete a tie-in on the 300mm supply line to supply a 250mm line which will be the main source supplying water to the Durbanville area. In order to do this a temporary shut off is scheduled for Sunday, 29 June 2025 from 09:00 until 16:00 affecting the following areas: Goedemoed, The Crest, Wellway Park, Graanendal 1, Morningstar, Vierlanden and Durmonte. Some areas will experience low pressure to no water during this time.
